name: Hidden search
description:
Hidden search is a hidden object search game , that you need to find object in some levels with 2 ways the normal way finding objects and the other way is letter missing in some objects that exist in the level you need to know the missing letters and enter the correct letters , the game have different music for each level . The game is by us from 2016 but in that year we did not have a store at itch and now we decide to release the old game hidden search have fun.

RKGAMES953 .
